extensionDescription.message: 2025 Saita sabon lambobin, tsarin kaya, rubutu, da makotan, cire damuwa na damuwa, popups, da dai sauransu.

header_subtitle.message: Mu kasance wanda zamu kasance mai kyau a Lichess! Mu yi amfani dashi.

mi_1.message: Yi amfani da "Jam'i mode" (saukin domin Kallon Yabo da Bullet)

mi_17.message: Zaɓi kofan bidiyo (kan hagu daki na dama)

d_title.message: Sadakar zai taimaka LichessHelper mai lafiya.

d_subtitle.message: Zan gwada lokaci kowane mako na week, nuna bugs, kuma sanar da damuwa ko yaushe. Damuwa ta damuwa shine damuwa ta gaba!

d_card.message: Sadaka ta kredi ko debit katin

d_cred__1.message: Zaka iya kuma bayar da kyawawan kwayarwa don LichessHelper tare da abokanka ko gani

s_title.message: An kuskure da damuwa tare da LichessHelper?

s_subtitle.message: Wannan suna mafi kusa ko wane damuwa da kuke yi wannan ake yi:

s_emailme.message: Idan damuwa baya nan, zaka iya yi email min a

s_effic.message: Don samun damuwa don shaidar min damuwa, to mey da wannan bayanai:

s_detail__1.message: Lissafin LichessHelper da kake amfani dashi.

s_detail__2.message: Shi ne screenshot ko bidiyo wanda ya nuna damuwa.

s_detail__4.message: Wayoyin katin da suka yi amfani da shi (misali, Firefox 86.0).

mi_14.message:
A Karya karin harkokin bawon tace 
(daga cikin trackpads, kuma)
